page.title: 09COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: Our Post Office is at Staunton Cross. The sub-postmaster is Mr Marshall. He also owns the village stores and he sells and delivers newspapers and magazines. Until 1979, the letters for our area were sorted at our post office but now they come sorted from Gloucester. We have postmen who take it in turns to do different rounds in their vans. Letters are collected at 10 a.m. and 5 p.m. and are taken to Gloucester for sorting. We have a telephone exchange in a brick building near Staunton Cross. It is called Staunton Court and the STD code is 045284. There is a public telephone box in Corse.
